tier.item: -TI [...] expresses to act (in any way), do, think, say; -TYO and -TYA? are variations of it. These
verbs take the subject prefix in concord with the noun or pronoun to which they refer, but are not
It is like this. It is as follows ... (Ashton et al. 1954: 59)
